special_text:
At the beginning of each end step, if Arietta has exactly one loyalty counter on her, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed.
[+1]: Gain control of up to one target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste and lifelink until end of turn.
[-3]: Create a 5/5 black Horror creature token and a colorless Equipment artifact token named Mortal Shackles with “Equipped creature gets -3/-3” and equip {2} attached to it.
[-8]: Destroy all other permanents.
